## assignDefaultNodePositions() function

Assigns a default position to each node in a table to ensure that it is plottable. Note that this is NOT a layout algorithm.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function assignDefaultNodePositions(nodes: ColumnTable, x?: string, y?: string, positioner?: Positioner): ColumnTable;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  nodes | ColumnTable |  |
|  x | string | <i>(Optional)</i> |
|  y | string | <i>(Optional)</i> |
|  positioner | [Positioner](./tables.positioner.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> |

<b>Returns:</b>

ColumnTable
